forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Fog early. High of 57F. Winds from the SSE at 5 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Fog early. High of 14C. Breezy. Winds from the SSE at 10 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain after midnight. Fog overnight. Low of 45F. Winds from the SSE at 5 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain after midnight. Fog overnight. Low of 7C. Breezy. Winds from the SSE at 10 to 20 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain. High of 66F. Winds from the South at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain. High of 19C. Breezy. Winds from the South at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain. Fog overnight. Low of 41F. Winds from the SSW at 10 to 15 mph shifting to the West after midnight. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a chance of rain. Fog overnight. Low of 5C. Breezy. Winds from the SSW at 15 to 20 km/h shifting to the West after midnight. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of rain. High of 45F. Winds from the NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of rain. High of 7C. Breezy. Winds from the NW at 10 to 20 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with ice pellets and snow, then a chance of snow after midnight. Fog overnight. Low of 27F with a windchill as low as 18F. Winds from the NNW at 5 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation 50% with accumulations up to 1 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with ice pellets and snow, then a chance of snow after midnight. Fog overnight. Low of -3C with a windchill as low as -8C. Breezy. Winds from the NNW at 10 to 20 km/h. Chance of precipitation 50% with accumulations up to 4 cm possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of snow and rain showers in the afternoon. Fog early. High of 32F with a windchill as low as 16F. Winds from the North at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40% with accumulations up to 1 in. possible.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of snow and rain showers in the afternoon. Fog early. High of 0C with a windchill as low as -9C. Breezy. Winds from the North at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40% with accumulations up to 3 cm possible.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with a chance of snow in the evening, then partly cloudy. Fog overnight. Low of 3F with a windchill as low as -9F. Winds from the North at 10 to 15 mph.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with a chance of snow in the evening, then partly cloudy. Fog overnight. Low of -16C with a windchill as low as -23C. Breezy. Winds from the North at 15 to 20 km/h.
